title: Set GitHub Actions secrets for ingestion (POSTGRES_*)
body: Add POSTGRES_DB, POSTGRES_USER, POSTGRES_PASSWORD, POSTGRES_HOST, POSTGRES_PORT under **Settings → Secrets and variables → Actions**. Required for `.github/workflows/daily-smart-ingestion.yml`.

title: Publish repository and tag v0.16.0 (auto-release)
body: Push main, create annotated tag `v0.16.0`, verify auto-release workflow creates a GitHub Release with notes from template.

title: Implement NDBC ingestion (incremental)
body: Fill `ingestion/ingest_ndbc.py` to fetch hourly/daily SST and met data via ERDDAP/NDBC endpoints; honor QC flags; upsert into obs tables; log `job_run`.

title: Implement ERSST monthly ingestion
body: Implement `ingestion/ingest_ersst.py` to fetch the latest monthly grid; write to `sst_grid_monthly` and record `job_run` with dataset version.

title: Implement surface currents ingestion
body: Build `ingestion/ingest_currents.py` to pull OSCAR/altimetry surface currents; store vectors; support bbox tiling.

title: Backend tests: pytest stubs
body: Add pytest + httpx tests for core endpoints (`/status`, `/stations`, `/grid/sst`). Wire to CI (optional separate workflow).

title: Website: add Story Mode timeline component
body: Create a reusable timeline component for Stories (El Niño, Marine Heatwaves) with month markers, links to map views.

title: Chatbot Phase 2: wire LLM via /api/chatbot
body: Connect the chatbot API stub to a provider (Claude/OpenAI) with safety guardrails, source attribution, and refusal policy for unsafe queries.

title: Add images and licenses to Stories
body: Create `assets/images/stories/*` with credit/attribution in captions; optimize for web; ensure alt text for accessibility.

title: Internationalization scaffold (i18n)
body: Add i18n support to the website for at least EN/ES; extract strings from nav, footer, hero sections.

title: Add CI badge to README
body: Add a status badge for `.github/workflows/ci-node.yml` to the README header.
